page.title: 05A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: Ring, ring,that's the sound I hear every day when the alarm goes off and I have to get up to go to school.But Sundays are different! When I get up I have my breakfast of grilled bacon and egg with a slice of toast and then I get dressed. I put on my jeans, a shirt and a jumper and then I have a wash and brush my teeth. The toothpaste is lovely and smells like chewing gum. After this I go to the shop and spend all my pocket money on sweets.At 1.00pm we have lunch of roast meat , boiled vegetables , potatoes and gravy . Sometimes I have a glass of wine . If we are lucky we have a pudding . After lunch I go upstairs and tidy up-after all , a room can get in quite a mess in a week . I have my tea at 5.00pm then I watch television , have a bath and a game of snooker before bed at 9.30pm.
